rules_text:
Flying
When this Vehicle enters, create a Junk token. [i](It's an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]
Whenever you sacrifice an artifact, you may put a +1/+1 counter on this Vehicle. If you don't, create a tapped Treasure token. Activate only once per turn.
Crew 2
